title: GreenNest
description: GreenNest is a beautifully designed single-page web application (SPA) for plant lovers who wish to create greener, healthier, and more aesthetic living spaces.

title: ProtectX
description: A powerful Discord anti-crash bot designed to protect servers from malicious attacks and unauthorized actions.

title: Kahoot Answers Viewer
description: Get answers to your kahoot quiz instantly. A helpful tool for students to verify their knowledge.
